name: Explorers (kaeque)
description:
Venture through various levels to learn more about the mental nuances of three main characters, all with distinct personalities, identities, and puzzles. As the plot unravels, will you be able to stop the madness?

Created for the May - Mental Health Month Game Jam.

Developers Note: We understand the playing screen is on the smaller end. This was due to exporting problems and other various Unity platform issues, but we hope you enjoy. :)
